text: The Thunderbolts are an antihero team appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The team consists mostly of reformed supervillains. Created by Kurt Busiek and Mark Bagley, the team first appeared in The Incredible Hulk (vol. 2) #449 (January 1997). == In other media == The team made its live-action cinematic debut in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movie Thunderbolts* (2025). Category:Marvel Comics supervillains
title: Thunderbolts (comics)
